00263 inline bool CVarVector::SetElementsCount(int count, double value)
00264 {
00265        Q_ASSERT(count >= 0);
00266 
00267        int oldCount = m_elements.size();
00268 
00269        m_elements.resize(count);
00270 
00271        for (int i = oldCount; i < count; ++i){
00272               m_elements[i] = value;
00273        }
00274 
00275        return true;
00276 }

00334 inline void CVarVector::Translate(const CVarVector& vector)
00335 {
00336        Q_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == vector.GetElementsCount());
00337 
00338        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00339        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00340               m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00341        }
00342 }

00357 inline void CVarVector::ScaledCumulate(const CVarVector& vector, double scale)
00358 {
00359        Q_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == vector.GetElementsCount());
00360 
00361        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00362        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00363               m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00364        }
00365 }

00368 inline bool CVarVector::IsNull(double tolerance) const
00369 {
00370        return GetLength2() <= tolerance * tolerance;
00371 }

00374 inline double CVarVector::GetDotProduct(const CVarVector& vector) const
00375 {
00376        Q_ASSERT(GetElementsCount() == vector.GetElementsCount());
00377 
00378        double retVal = 0.0;
00379 
00380        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00381        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00382               retVal +=  m_elements[i] * vector.m_elements[i];
00383        }
00384 
00385        return retVal;
00386 }

00389 inline double CVarVector::GetLength2() const

00395 inline double CVarVector::GetLength() const

00407 inline double CVarVector::GetDistance(const CVarVector& vector) const
00408 {

00427 inline bool CVarVector::operator<(const CVarVector& vector) const
00428 {
00429        int count = m_elements.size();
00430        int vectorCount = vector.m_elements.size();
00431        int commonSize = qMin(count, vectorCount);
00432        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00433               int element = m_elements[i];
00434               int vectorElement = vector.m_elements[i];
00435               if (element != vectorElement){
00436                      return element < vectorElement;
00437               }
00438        }
00439 
00440        return count < vectorCount;
00441 }
00442

00444 inline bool CVarVector::operator>(const CVarVector& vector) const
00445 {
00446        int count = m_elements.size();
00447        int vectorCount = vector.m_elements.size();
00448        int commonSize = qMin(count, vectorCount);
00449        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00450               int element = m_elements[i];
00451               int vectorElement = vector.m_elements[i];
00452               if (element != vectorElement){
00453                      return element > vectorElement;
00454               }
00455        }
00456 
00457        return count > vectorCount;
00458 }

00552 inline CVarVector CVarVector::operator-() const
00553 {
00554        int elementsCount = GetElementsCount();
00555 
00556        CVarVector retVal(elementsCount);
00557 
00558        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00559               retVal.m_elements[i] = -m_elements[i];
00560        }
00561 
00562        return retVal;

00626 template <int Size>
00627 CVarVector::CVarVector(const TVector<Size, double>& vector)
00628 {
00629        m_elements.resize(Size);
00630 
00631 
00632        for (int i = 0; i < Size; ++i){
00633               m_elements[i] = vector[i];
00634        }
00635 }
